metadata.title: CVE-2016-2119 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
libcli/smb/smbXcli_base.c in Samba 4.x before 4.2.14, 4.3.x before 4.3.11,and 4.4.x before 4.4.5 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to bypass aclient-signing protection mechanism, and consequently spoof SMB2 and SMB3servers, via the (1) SMB2_SESSION_FLAG_IS_GUEST or (2)SMB2_SESSION_FLAG_IS_NULL flag.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2119` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ctdb - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libnss-winbind - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libpam-winbind - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libparse-pidl-perl - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libsmbclient - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libwbclient0 - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
python-samba - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
registry-tools - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
samba - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
samba-common - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
samba-common-bin - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
samba-libs - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
samba-testsuite - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
smbclient - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
winbind - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: samba package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
